data: {"generalSituation":"A fresh to strong easterly airstream will continue to affect the coast of Guangdong on New Year's Day, while a cold front will move across the coastal areas later. Under the influence of the associated winter monsoon, winds will strengthen from the north and temperatures will fall appreciably over the region. It will become cold and the weather will improve on Friday and Saturday. Dry replenishments of the monsoon are expected to influence Guangdong persistently early to midweek next week. It will be generally fine and remain rather cool in the morning over the region. The temperature difference between day and night will be rather large over inland areas.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260101","week":"Thursday","forecastWind":"East force 4 to 5, occasionally force 6 offshore and on high ground. North force 5 at night.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy. Sunny periods during the day.
